itemListElement.name: Kadai Chole – Spiced Chickpeas and Potatoes

@graph.name: Kadai Chole/Chana - Spiced Chickpeas and Potatoes
@graph.description: Kadai Chole is a delicious Chickpea curry generally made in an Indian wok. 1 Pot 30 min Spiced Chickpeas and Potatoes. Vegan Glutenfree Soyfree Nutfree Recipe
recipeIngredient: 15 oz can of chickpeas, drained (or 1.5 cups cooked chickpeas)
1/4 tsp smoked paprika ((or more, to taste))
sliced onion, tomato, cayenne, cilantro, lemon juice for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Blend together the ginger, garlic, half green chili, coriander, cumin and paprika with 2-3 tbsp of water until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend together the ginger, garlic, half green chili, coriander, cumin and paprika with 2-3 tbsp of water until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a regular skillet or kadai over medium high heat. Add cinnamon stick and bay leaf and cook for a few seconds. Add the blended mixture to the skillet and cook for 3 to 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a regular skillet or kadai over medium high heat. Add cinnamon stick and bay leaf and cook for a few seconds. Add the blended mixture to the skillet and cook for 3 to 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the tomatoes into a puree and add to the skillet, cook for 4 minutes or until garlic smell isnt raw.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the tomatoes into a puree and add to the skillet, cook for 4 minutes or until garlic smell isnt raw.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpeas, potatoes, 1 cup of water and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Cover, reduce heat to medium and cook for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chickpeas, potatoes, 1 cup of water and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Cover, reduce heat to medium and cook for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the peppers, ginger, paprika, lemon juice, half a green chili chopped and garam masala, if using. (You can also add in 1/2 a teaspoon amchur (mango powder) and 1/2 a teaspoon dried fenugreek leaves (or 1/8 tsp powder) for variation.) Mix well. Add more water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the peppers, ginger, paprika, lemon juice, half a green chili chopped and garam masala, if using. (You can also add in 1/2 a teaspoon amchur (mango powder) and 1/2 a teaspoon dried fenugreek leaves (or 1/8 tsp powder) for variation.) Mix well. Add more water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 2 mins. Taste and adjust the salt and heat. Garnish with sliced onion, chopped tomato, smoked paprika/cayenne and a dash of lemon juice and cilantro. Serve with rice or flatbread or make wraps.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 2 mins. Taste and adjust the salt and heat. Garnish with sliced onion, chopped tomato, smoked paprika/cayenne and a dash of lemon juice and cilantro. Serve with rice or flatbread or make wraps.

@graph.keywords: kadai chana, kadai chole, kadai curry, spiced chickpeas and potatoes
